name: Grim Repair
description:
Trapped aboard a sinking vessel, you'll have to work fast with your comrades to avoid death under the sea. Patch holes, close doors, and run around. Maybe abandon your friends.

D-pad to move

Bottom button to interact with doors and leaks

Grim Repair is best played as a downloadable game with up to four of your friends. This web version will let you explore the submarine on your own though using arrow keys for movement and space bar to interact. 

Global Game Jam 2020
